bleu¶

compute_bleu[source]

compute_bleu(generated_seq2seq, generate_args:GenerateArgs, dec_tokenizer:PreTrainedTokenizer, val_dl)

generated_seq2seq: seq2seq model with function generate_from_ids val_dl: (src_inp_ids, tgt_inpids, ) src_inp_ids: (bs, enc_seq_len), tgt_inp_ids: (bs, dec_seq_len)
